start.paragraph1: When starting a report, you are going to be asked a few questions that will help to figure out, on which areas a disease herd might exist and who might be affected. You can exit the report any time without any data stored or sent to our server, but of course for success it is critical to have as many participants as possible.
start.paragraph2: Each step provides a help icon to explain why we need that information. In case you verify your phone number - which will help to make the data more trustworthy - we will only store a secured hash of it on the server and no other information that could identify you. You can request data deletion any time in the settings screen.
start.paragraph3: Thanks for supporting the cause against CoVid19 and we hope you will soon be healthy again!

contacts.amountTitle: With how many persons did you have contact?

submit.title: Report Submission
submit.successText: We submitted the report! Thanks for your help fighting CoVid!

exit.title: Exit Report
exit.text: Do you really want to exit the report? It will not be saved.
